sources.title: Big Show-Off, The
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: The Big Show-Off (1945) COMEDY
sources.description:
Stars: Arthur Lake, Dale Evans, Lionel Stander
Director: Howard Bretherton

In this wacky musical comedy, a shy nightclub pianist poses as a masked wrestler to win the heart of his band's beautiful vocalist (Dale Evans).

sources.title: The Big Show-Off (1945) Comedy, Drama, Music Full Length Movie
sources.description:
Joe Bagley, owner of the Blue Heaven Club, so he poses as a wrestler to foster a romance, and win the heart of a beautiful but shy pianist.

metadata.Plot: Joe Bagley, owner of the Blue Heaven Club, tries to foster a romance between shy pianist Sandy Elliott and band vocalist June Mayfield. Joe tells June that Sandy is really a professional, masked wrestler known as "The Devil." Wally Porter, also in love with June doesn't believe the story. The real wrestler breaks a leg in a match and Sandy, in order to keep up the ruse now has to wear a cast on his leg. June attends a match and hears the real Devil announce his engagement to another girl.
metadata.Actors: Arthur Lake, Dale Evans, Lionel Stander
